de.must.appletserver
Class Search

java.lang.Object
  de.must.appletserver.RemoteUserInterface
      de.must.appletserver.PropertyAdministration
          de.must.appletserver.Search
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppletTalker, Remotable, RemotableControler
public abstract class Search
extends PropertyAdministration

Dialog for entering search specifications.

getElaboratedWhereCondition

public java.lang.String getElaboratedWhereCondition()
Returns the where condition.

Returns:
the where condition

getAdditionalWhereConditionForGlobalSearch

protected java.lang.String getAdditionalWhereConditionForGlobalSearch()
Returns additional where conditions for global search. By default, null is returned. Override method to extend search by e.g. expression 'myKey in (select myKey in keyTable where fieldOfKeyTable like '%" + globalSearchTextField.getText()+ "%'))'

Returns:
additional where conditions for global search

getWhereCondition

protected abstract java.lang.String getWhereCondition()
Returns the where condition for the select statement to process the inquiry. See subclass code for samples for samples how this may be implemented. In the simplest case it looks like return DbFieldName like '%" + UIfield.getText() + "%'";

Returns:
the where condition for the select statement

appendIfFilled

protected void appendIfFilled(WhereCondition whereCondition,
                              java.lang.String[] columnNames,
                              java.lang.String searchString)
Appends a fragment to the where condition. May be a part of a word.

Parameters:
whereCondition - the where condition to extend
columnNames - the columns to be used to search
searchString - the string to search

appendIfFilled

protected void appendIfFilled(WhereCondition whereCondition,
                              java.lang.String[] columnNames,
                              java.lang.String searchString,
                              boolean wholeWord)
Appends a fragment to the where condition.

Parameters:
whereCondition - the where condition to extend
columnNames - the columns to be used to search
searchString - the string to search
wholeWord - whether the expression is to be searched as a whole word

                                     java.lang.String columnName,
                                     java.lang.String searchString)
Appends a search as a whole word.

Parameters:
whereCondition - the where condition to extend
columnName - the name of the column to be searched in
searchString - the expression to be searched as a whole word

                                     boolean startingWithOr)
Appends a search as a whole word.

Parameters:
whereCondition - the where condition to extend
columnName - the name of the column to be searched in
